mapper.sql: user_id, user_account, user_password, user_nickname, mobile_phone, sex, user_status, create_time, update_time, role_id, token
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (user_id, user_account, user_password, user_nickname, mobile_phone, sex, user_status, create_time, update_time, role_id, token) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.role_name FROM sys_user a LEFT JOIN sys_role b ON a.role_id=b.role_id WHERE a.user_account=#{userAccount}
SELECT a.*,b.role_name FROM sys_user a,sys_role b WHERE a.role_id = b.role_id AND a.user_status=#{status} AND a.${searchKey} like '%${searchValue}%' ORDER BY a.create_time ASC
